author: Kyle Mathis
description: Unusual in its bold use of a half shot of Angostura Bitters. In Knee High Bar in Seattle, USA I've tried this cocktail made with a massive one-and-a-half shots. However, half a shot seems more than generous.
name: Port of Spain cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
